summary: The script defines and runs a comparative simulation scenario that evaluates vertical health program scale‑up both with and without health‑system strengthening (HSS) assumptions. It assembles scenario definitions, mixes them, configures logging, and launches the full model using the TLO batch system.
business_intent: To assess the added value of health‑system strengthening when scaling up disease‑specific vertical programs, providing evidence for policy makers on whether integrating HSS improves health outcomes and resource efficiency.
